comment: Smart Data Models - GovSteam1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovSteam1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Steam turbine governor model, based on the GovSteamIEEE1 model  (with optional deadband and nonlinear valve gain added).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Intentional deadband width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: db2
contents.comment: Unintentional deadband (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: eps
contents.comment: Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 1 (GV1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 2 (GV2).  Typical Value = 0.4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 3 (GV3).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 4 (GV4).  Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 5 (GV5).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain valve position point 6 (GV6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k
contents.comment: Governor gain (reciprocal of droop) (K) (>0).  Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Fraction of HP shaft power after first boiler pass (K1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k2
contents.comment: Fraction of LP shaft power after first boiler pass (K2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k3
contents.comment: Fraction of HP shaft power after second boiler pass (K3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k4
contents.comment: Fraction of LP shaft power after second boiler pass (K4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k5
contents.comment: Fraction of HP shaft power after third boiler pass (K5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k6
contents.comment: Fraction of LP shaft power after third boiler pass (K6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k7
contents.comment: Fraction of HP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k8
contents.comment: Fraction of LP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K8).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pgv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 1 (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 2 (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 3 (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0.91. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 4 (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0.98. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 5 (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain power value point 6 (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmax
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening (Pmax) (> Pmin).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmin
contents.comment: Minimum valve opening (Pmin) (>=0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: sdb1
contents.comment: Intentional deadband indicator. true = intentional deadband is applied false = intentional deadband is not applied. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: sdb2
contents.comment: Unintentional deadband location. true = intentional deadband is applied before point `A` false = intentional deadband is applied after point `A`. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Governor lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Governor lead time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Valve positioner time constant (T3(>0).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Inlet piping/steam bowl time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Time constant of second boiler pass (T5).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Time constant of third boiler pass (T6).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t7
contents.comment: Time constant of fourth boiler pass (T7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: uc
contents.comment: Maximum valve closing velocity (Uc) (<0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: uo
contents.comment: Maximum valve opening velocity (Uo) (>0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: valve
contents.comment: Nonlinear valve characteristic. true = nonlinear valve characteristic is used false = nonlinear valve characteristic is not used. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
